short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleans up Facebook page by removing unwanted posts/ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When viewing Facebook on Chrome (or MS Edge), this extension removes:
- "Suggested For You" posts
- sponsored content
- Reels and Short Videos

and thereby making it a (slightly more) pleasant experience.

Open sourced under MIT license
https://github.com/prashsaka/cleanbook
